#Text=( ( WN ) ) : If the campaigners are presenting genuine arguments , why has there not been more action from governments ( in particular the United States ) ?
#Text=J.J. : Short answer : Because governments sometimes suck ? : ) But really , on xenutv.com there 's an interview with Ray Emmons of the Clearwater Police .
#Text=He said he compiled a lot of information about Scientology , then presented it to the feds .
#Text=Their response ; " will they come after me ?

column1: #Text=Part of it is incompetence , imho [ In My Humble Opinion ] .
#Text=But remember there have been governmental charges against Scientology , even in the Lisa McPherson case .
#Text=( ( WN ) ) : Church of Scientology has fought and won legal actions , juries cannot be that easy to sway ?
#Text=J.J. :
#Text=I ca n't think of many cases that Scientology actually won .
#Text=You 'd have to give me a couple of cases .
#Text=Generally , Scientology sues in civil court to harass and intimidate , not even to win anyway .
#Text=So I 'd need a specific case to discuss here I guess ...
#Text=( ( WN ) ) :
#Text=Did you actually know Lisa ?
#Text=Or any of her family ?
#Text=J.J. :
#Text=No , I first heard of Lisa about one year after she died .
#Text=I have met her cousin , her aunts and uncle .
#Text=They are all very nice .
#Text=Lisa 's mom died about one month after Lisa did .
#Text=Her brother and dad died several years before she did .
#Text=( ( WN ) ) : Is n't it disrespectful of Lisa 's memory to use her memory for purposes so clearly counter to her known beliefs ?
#Text=J.J. : My question there ; what were her beliefs when she was being held against her will in her last days ?
#Text=My suspicion is she changed her mind about Scientology .
#Text=I know I would have .
#Text=But her friend , Kelli Davis , said she had talked to Lisa not long before she died , and Kelly thought that Lisa was implying that she was leaving Scientology .
#Text=So my opinion is that Lisa 's beliefs in her last days was that Scientology sucked and I will go with that .
#Text=( ( WN ) ) : Is it possible to bring murder or manslaughter charges against the Church of Scientology again ?
#Text=J.J. : IANAL [ I am not a lawyer ] but there 's no statute of limitations for murder .
#Text=I hope that will happen some day .
#Text=Perhaps some of the people involved will come forward with information compelling to a prosecutor
#Text=( ( WN ) ) :
#Text=Do you know any details about the 2004 settlement with Lisa 's relatives ?
#Text=Is it true that they have not yet received any money from this settlement with the Church of Scientology ?
#Text=J.J. :
#Text=On lisamcpherson.org is a statement from Lisa 's family after their " settlement " of the civil suit .
#Text=I do not know for sure .
#Text=I believe the court case is still listed as active .
#Text=As far as whether they were paid , I do not know .
#Text=The assumption was that it was over though .
